mapper.select: select a.id,a.uid,a.qid,a.content,a.create_time as createTime, b.nickname,b.headerimg from zl_answer as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid where a.qid = #{questionId} and a.examine = 1 order by a.create_time desc

select a.id,a.uid,b.nickname,b.headerimg,a.qid, a.content,a.create_time as createTime,a.support_nums as supportNums, c.uid as quesUid,d.nickname as quesNickname,d.headerimg as quesHeaderimg, c.iid,c.info_class as infoClass,c.title,c.content as quesContent,c.create_time as quesCreateTime, CASE WHEN ca.title IS NULL then spec.`name` else ca.title end as source from zl_answer as a left join zl_customer as b on b.id = a.uid left join zl_questions as c on c.id = a.qid left join zl_customer as d on d.id = c.uid left join zl_specification as spec on spec.id = c.iid and c.info_class = 1 left join zl_application_case as ca on ca.id = c.iid and c.info_class = 2 where a.uid = #{userId} and a.examine = 1 and c.examine = 1 order by a.create_time desc
select COUNT(*) from zl_answer as a left join zl_questions as b on b.id = a.qid where a.uid = #{userId} and a.examine = 1 and b.examine = 1
